categories: Category:Unidentified members of the Ohnaka Gang

nodes.text: A Weequay pirate was a member of the Ohnaka Gang during the Clone Wars, at the time when many of the Ohnaka Gang's pirates rebeled against their leader under the control of the manipulative brothers, Darth Maul and Savage Opress. Once the two factions had been reunited, this pirate, among others, attempted to kill the brothers in order to get a hold of their riches. However, the brothers managed to reach their ship, and were planning to pilot the ship off Florrum, when this pirate was ordered by Hondo Ohnaka to shoot the two Sith's ship down. The pirate hit the target, and the pirates ended up with much wealth and weaponry after scavenging the crash site.
A few scenes prior to when this pirate shoots down the ship, the pirate's bandanna appears to be a lighter, almost white, shade.
Star Wars: The Clone Wars – "Revival" (First appearance)
